NK041(di)022:1: // gtor ma cha gsum gyi cho ga bzhugs so //
NK041(di)022:2: bla ma dang dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK041(di)022:3: rdo rje theg pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga'i
NK041(di)022:4: skabs su cha gsum gtor ma rgyas 'bring bsdus pa'i
NK041(di)022:5: tshul ji snyed cig gsungs pa las 'di ltar shes
NK041(di)022:6: par bya ste / rin po che la sogs pa'i
NK041(di)022:7: snod gsum gyi dang po gnyis su phyogs skyong dang
NK041(di)022:8: 'byung po spyi'i gtor zlum theb kyu can 'bras chan
NK041(di)022:9: la phug sogs dkar zhing gtsang ba'i bza' bca' sna
NK041(di)022:11: gsum par bgegs kyi gtor ma ting lo chang bu
NK041(di)022:12: can sha chang sogs kyis spags pa rnams gral rim
NK041(di)022:13: gyis bshams la / bsang chus sbran te /
NK041(di)022:14: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi rgyas /
NK041(di)022:17: badz+ra dz+wa la a na la ha na da ha pa tsa ma tha b+hany+dza ra na h+aum phata /
NK041(di)022:20: stong pa'i ngang las b+h+r+au las rin po che'i snod
NK041(di)022:21: zab cing rgya che ba'i nang du gtor ma kha
NK041(di)022:22: dog dri ro nus pa phun sum tshogs pa bdud
NK041(di)022:23: rtsi'i rgya mtsho chen por gyur par bsam la /
NK041(di)022:24: +aahh+aum hoh lan gsum gyis thun mong du byin gyis brlab bo //
NK041(di)022:25: de nas gtor ma dang po phyogs skyong bcu la 'bul te /
NK041(di)022:26: rang gi thugs ka'i h+aum gi 'od zer gyis phyogs skyong 'khor bcas spyan drangs par bsam la /
NK041(di)022:28: phyogs skyong 'jig rten skyong ba dbang dang ldan //
NK041(di)022:29: thugs rje thabs mkhas thugs dam dkyil po che //
NK041(di)022:30: lha dang drang srong yi dwags srin po klu //
NK041(di)022:31: rig 'dzin rgyal ba dang ni gnod sbyin bdag /
NK041(di)022:32: de dag so so'i dbang po'i skur ston pa //
NK041(di)022:33: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten skyong ba bzhugs so 'tshal //
NK041(di)022:34: bstan pa rgyas pa'i slad du spyan 'dren na //
NK041(di)022:35: 'gro ba'i don du mchod kyis gshegs su gsol //
NK041(di)022:36: da sha di klo ka p+aa las pa ri w+aa ra e h+ye hi /
NK041(di)022:38: pad+ma ka ma l+aa ya s+t+wam gyis gdan phul la /
NK041(di)022:48: s+aur+ya gra ha ad+hi pa ta ye /
NK041(di)022:49: tsan+d+ra nak+sha tra a d+hi pa ta ye /
NK041(di)022:50: a d+ho pri thi we b+h+yah a su re b+h+yah n+aa ge b+h+yah sa pa ri w+aa ra ar+g+hamsogs /
NK041(di)022:52: rdo rje thal mo kha gyen du phye la /
NK041(di)022:53: in+d+ra sogs sngar gyi sngags mthar /
NK041(di)022:54: na mahsarba ta th+aa ga te b+h+yo bi shwa sogs btags pa gsum gyis gtor ma phul la /
NK041(di)022:55: dbang po rdo rje 'chang ba'i lha //
NK041(di)022:56: lha yi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag /
NK041(di)022:57: shar phyogs dri za'i tshogs bcas la //
NK041(di)022:58: mchod cing bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal //
NK041(di)022:59: me ste bsreg bya za ba'i lha //
NK041(di)022:60: drang srong rgyal po gdon gyi shar lho me lha'i mchod cing gshin rje be con 'chang ba'i lha //
NK041(di)022:61: ma mo'i rgyal po lho phyogs gshin rje'i mchod cing bden dang bral ba legs ldan lha //
NK041(di)022:62: srin po'i rgyal po lho nub srin po'i mchod cing bstod zhags pa thogs pa chu yi lha //
NK041(di)022:63: tshig srung rgyal po nub phyogs chu lha'i mchod cing rlung ste srog kyang 'dzin pa'i lha //
NK041(di)022:64: rig 'dzin rgyal po nub byang rlung lha'i mchod cing gnod sbyin lag na dbyug tho thogs //
NK041(di)022:65: nor srung rgyal po byang phyogs gnod sbyin mchod cing dbang dang ldan pa 'dren pa'i lha //
NK041(di)022:66: 'byung po'i rgyal po byang shar dbang ldan mchod cing steng gi tshangs pa chen po dang //
NK041(di)022:67: nyi ma zla ba gza' chen po //
NK041(di)022:68: gza' dang rgyu skar tshogs bcas la //
NK041(di)022:69: mchod cing 'og gi klu ste sa yi lha //
NK041(di)022:70: sa 'dzin lag pa chen po dang //
NK041(di)022:71: dam tshig shes pa'i tshogs bcas la //
NK041(di)022:72: mchod cing bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal //
NK041(di)022:74: shar phyogs rdo rje can gyi lha tshogs 'khor dang bcas //
NK041(di)022:75: gtor ma phul ba 'di dag bzhes su gsol //
NK041(di)022:76: me dang gshin rje bden bral srin po'i bdag /
NK041(di)022:77: chu bdag rlung bdag nor gyi bdag po dang //
NK041(di)022:78: dbang ldan lha ste 'byung po'i bdag po dang //
NK041(di)022:79: steng gi nyi zla tshangs pa chen po dang //
NK041(di)022:80: lha rnams kun dang gang dag sa steng klu //
NK041(di)022:81: ri yi lha dang gtsang ma'i tshogs bcas la //
NK041(di)022:82: sa sa so sor gtor ma phul ba rnams //
NK041(di)022:83: rab tu dgyes pa yis ni bzhes nas kyang //
NK041(di)022:84: rang rang phyogs su legs par bzhugs nas su //
NK041(di)022:85: rang gi bu smad mdza' bshes gnyen 'dun dang //
NK041(di)022:86: nang mi dmag dang dpung bcas lhan cig tu //
NK041(di)022:87: me tog dri dang byug pa bdug par bcas //
NK041(di)022:88: bstod dang gtor ma mar me gus 'bul na //
NK041(di)022:89: 'di rnams gsol zhing legs par bsnams nas kyang //
NK041(di)022:90: bdag gi las kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod //
NK041(di)022:92: +amo da sha di ka sogs kyi mthar /
NK041(di)022:93: gats+tsha btags pas gshegs su gsol /
NK041(di)022:94: gtor ma gnyis pa 'byung po spyi la 'bul te /
NK041(di)022:95: lha dang lha min gnod sbyin lto 'phye grul //
NK041(di)022:96: nam mkha' lding dang 'dab bzang lus srul po //
NK041(di)022:97: dri za srin po gdon gyi rigs rnams dang //
NK041(di)022:98: gang dag sa la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can //
NK041(di)022:99: bu smad bcas shing g.yog 'khor bcas pa la //
NK041(di)022:100: bdag gi pus mo sa la btsugs nas ni //
NK041(di)022:101: thal mo sbyar nas khyod la gsol 'debs kyis //
NK041(di)022:102: gsan nas phan gdags slad du 'dir gshegs shig /
NK041(di)022:103: sarba lo ka p+aa la e h+ye his spyan drangs /
NK041(di)022:104: pad+ma ka ma l+aa ya s+t+wam gyis gdan phul /
NK041(di)022:116: sa pa ri w+aa ra ar+g+ham sogs kyis mchod /
NK041(di)022:117: rdo thal gyen du phye ste /
NK041(di)022:118: de ba sogs sngar gyi sngags mthar /
NK041(di)022:119: na mahsarba sogs btags pa gsum gyis gtor ma phul la /
NK041(di)022:120: 'byung po gang dag ri rab steng gnas dang //
NK041(di)022:121: dga' ba'i tshal dang lha yi gnas rnams dang //
NK041(di)022:122: shar nub ri dang nyi zla'i khyim rnams dang //
NK041(di)022:123: ri bo kun la gang dag gnas pa dang //
NK041(di)022:124: rin chen gling na lhag par gang gnas dang //
NK041(di)022:125: chu bo kun dang chu yi mdo rnams dang //
NK041(di)022:126: mtsho dang rdzing bu lteng ka chu ngogs dang //
NK041(di)022:127: g.ya' chu bsil ma can na gang gnas dang //
NK041(di)022:128: grong dang phyugs lhas grong khyer stong pa dang //
NK041(di)022:129: khang stong dag dang lha yi khang pa dang //
NK041(di)022:130: gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten gnas rnams dang //
NK041(di)022:131: dka' thub gnas dang glang chen bres rnams dang //
NK041(di)022:132: rgyal po'i dkor khang dag na gang gnas dang //
NK041(di)022:133: lam srang sum mdo dang ni bzhi mdo dang //
NK041(di)022:134: gang dag lam po che dang shing gcig drung //
NK041(di)022:135: dur khrod chen po nags tshal chen po dang //
NK041(di)022:136: seng ge dred dang gcan gzan gnas rnams dang //
NK041(di)022:137: 'brog chen 'jigs su rung bar gang gnas dang //
NK041(di)022:138: gang dag gling mchog dag na gnas pa dang //
NK041(di)022:139: lhun po dur khrod dag na gnas pa rnams //
NK041(di)022:140: rab tu dgyes shing mgu bar gyur nas su //
NK041(di)022:141: phreng ba dri dang byug pa me tog dang //
NK041(di)022:142: bstod dang gtor ma mar me gus 'bul na //
NK041(di)022:143: 'di dag gsol zhing legs par bsnams nas kyang //
NK041(di)022:144: bdag gi las kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod //
NK041(di)022:147: sdig pa ci yang mi bya ste //
NK041(di)022:148: dge ba phun sum tshogs par spyad //
NK041(di)022:149: rang gi sems ni yongs su 'dul //
NK041(di)022:150: 'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa yin //
NK041(di)022:151: zhes chos kyi sbyin pa bya /
NK041(di)022:152: sarba lo ka p+aa la gats+tsha /
NK041(di)022:154: gsum pa bgegs la bsngo ste /
NK041(di)022:155: badz+ra ma h+aa sh+r+ai he ru ko&a ham /
NK041(di)022:156: rang nyid rdo rje khro bo'i skur gyur par bsam la h+aum mdzad kyi rgyas /
NK041(di)022:158: rje btsun rtsa ba dang brgyud par bcas pa'i dpal
NK041(di)022:159: ldan bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' bden pa
NK041(di)022:160: dang / sangs rgyas kyi bka' chos kyi dge 'dun
NK041(di)022:161: gyi gsang sngags rigs sngags gzungs sngags snying po phyag
NK041(di)022:162: rgya ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi bden pa dang /
NK041(di)022:163: bden pa chen po'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bgegs kyi
NK041(di)022:164: rigs gang yin pa de dag thams cad skad cig
NK041(di)022:165: yud tsam la 'dir mchis par gyur cig /
NK041(di)022:166: t+aak+ki h+aum dzah zhes pas spyan drangs /
NK041(di)022:167: gum ka ri gum ka ri s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)022:168: pi tsi pi tsi s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)022:170: sarba big+h+n+aam grih+ne dam ar+g+ham sogs kyis mchod /
NK041(di)022:171: rdor thal se gol dang bcas pas /
NK041(di)022:172: gum ka ri sogs gong gi sngags mthar /
NK041(di)022:173: sarba big+h+n+aan+na mah sogs gsum gyis gtor ma byin la /
NK041(di)022:174: gang zhig mtshan mo rgyu ba yi //
NK041(di)022:175: 'byung po rnams dang sha za dang //
NK041(di)022:176: srin po sha rjen za ba dang //
NK041(di)022:177: sems can rnam pa sna tshogs pa //
NK041(di)022:178: ljon shing gel pa sogs gnas dang //
NK041(di)022:179: de dang de la gtor ma ni //
NK041(di)022:180: bza' ba sha chang la phug bcas //
NK041(di)022:182: mchod pa 'di yis mgu byos la //
NK041(di)022:183: gnod pa'i bsam pa zhi ba dang //
NK041(di)022:184: bdag cag rnams la phan pa'i yid //
NK041(di)022:185: de ring phyin chad bskyed par gyis //
NK041(di)022:186: rgyan gyis brgyan par byas shing chos spyod cing //
NK041(di)022:187: dul zhing yang dag sdom la tshangs bar spyod //
NK041(di)022:188: 'byung po kun la chad pa spangs pa ste //
NK041(di)022:189: dge slong dge sbyong de yin bram ze'ang de //
NK041(di)022:190: mtshon chas mi 'jig gang yang med //
NK041(di)022:192: rang gi lus la dpe long la //
NK041(di)022:193: gzhan la gnod pa ma byed cig //
NK041(di)022:194: chen po'am chung ngu gang dag gis //
NK041(di)022:195: lus la mngon par gnod gyur pa'i //
NK041(di)022:196: nad de nye bar phyungs nas su //
NK041(di)022:197: gdon de rang gi gnas su dengs //
NK041(di)022:198: de ltar bdag gis ci nus kyis //
NK041(di)022:199: mchod dang bsnyen bkur byas pa yis //
NK041(di)022:200: dam tshig la ni gnas nas su //
NK041(di)022:201: bdag gi bsam pa bskang bar mdzod //
NK041(di)022:202: rtag tu dam tshig la gnas shing //
NK041(di)022:203: 'dir ni sems can thams cad kyi //
NK041(di)022:204: nad de rab tu sol mdzod la //
NK041(di)022:205: gdon rnams rang gi gnas su song //
NK041(di)022:207: chos kyi sbyin pa gong bzhin byas la /
NK041(di)022:209: gang dag gdug cing rtsub pa'i sems 'chang ba thams cad 'dir ma gnas par gzhan du dengs shig /
NK041(di)022:210: gal te mi 'gro na khro bo ye shes kyi
NK041(di)022:211: rdo rje me rab tu 'bar ba 'dis gdon bgegs
NK041(di)022:212: khyed rnams kyi mgo bo tshal pa brgyar 'gags par
NK041(di)022:213: 'gyur ta re / sum b+ha ni sogs h+aum bzhi
NK041(di)022:214: pa'i sngags dang rol mo'i sgra drag pos bskrad par
NK041(di)022:215: bya zhing gtor ma rnams gtsang sar rim par bzhin
NK041(di)022:216: 'gyur ta re / dor ro // slar yang /
NK041(di)022:217: 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur tam //
NK041(di)022:218: sa'am 'on te bar snang 'khod kyang rung //
NK041(di)022:219: skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed cing //
NK041(di)022:220: nyin dang mtshan du chos la spyod par shog /
NK041(di)022:221: ces smon lam gdab par bya'o //
NK041(di)022:222: gtor ma cha gsum gyi cho ga 'di ni snga 'gyur bka' ma'i yig cha du ma dang /
NK041(di)022:223: sgrub chen bde gshegs 'dus pa'i gtor chog sogs las btus shing /
NK041(di)022:224: phyi 'gyur ba'i lugs dang yang mi 'gal bar mtshungs
NK041(di)022:225: par byas te sh+aakya'i dge bsnyen rig pa 'dzin pa
